src:
To je novo v ločitvi Monike in Zmaga Jelinčiča
Kar je napovedal, je tudi storil.
04 Nov 2019, 10:22 by A. L.
Prvak SNS in poslanec Zmago Jelinčič Plemeniti in Monika Zupanc Jelinčič bosta eno od svojih težav, odkar sta v postopku ločitve, v četrtek začela reševati na sodišču. Opozicijski poslanec, ki občasno podpre vlado, se je namreč odločil, da bo v pravdi na Okrožnem sodišču v Ljubljani zahteval vračilo darila, kar je tudi javno pred časom že napovedal. Gre za znamenito parcelo na Primorskem, vredno 667.649,45 evra, zaradi katere se je nekoč še kako prašilo.Zanimivo je, da je pred leti dejal, da mu do parcele ni pomagal takratni koprski župan Boris Popovič, temveč je bil denar ženin, od družine. »Ko si poročen, je vse družinska last,« je takrat izpostavil Jelinčič. Dodal je še, da je dodatno služila tudi njegova žena (kdo je njen novi partner, poglejte v članku VIDEO: Prvi odziv novega partnerja Jelinčičeve Monike). Zdaj ko se ločujeta, je dejstva o njunem (ali njegovem) premoženju slišati takole: v medijih zatrjuje, da je Monika k njemu prišla brez premoženja in da tudi ni vlagala v hiši v slovenski prestolnici ali na Obali.Do razpravljanja v javnosti o premoženju zakoncev Jelinčič je prišlo, ko je Monika na dražbi leta 2011 kupila zemljišče tik ob hitri cesti med Koprom in Izolo. Njeno premoženje in neto prihodek se nista skladala, zaradi česar se je znašla pod lupo takratne davčne uprave. Delo je poročalo, da je Monika takrat priznala, da ji je 667.000 evrov podaril mož, on pa da je do denarja prišel s prodajo starin in numizmatične zbirke (še prej je za medije povedal zgodbo, ki ni bila resnična – da mu je denar posodil štajerski slavček Damjan Murko). Ne glede na vse ji je danes finančna uprava odmerila četrt milijona evrov davka, na kar pa se je pritožila in na koncu bila uspešna.
text:
This is new in the separation of Monica and Victory Jelincic
What he announced, he did.
04 Nov 2019, 10:22 by A.L.
SNS Champion and Member of Parliament Zmago Jelincic Noble and Monika Zupanc Jelincic will face one of their problems since they were in the process of separation on Thursday. The opposition MP, who occasionally backs the government, has decided to demand a return of the gift in court at the Ljubljana District Court, which he has announced publicly some time ago. It is a famous parcel in Primorska, worth € 667,649.45, which once made it dusty. It is interesting to note that years ago he said that the parish mayor Boris Popovich did not help him until the plot, but that he was the groom's money, from families. "When you are married, everything is family property," Jelincic pointed out at the time. He also added that his wife also served (who is her new partner, see the VIDEO article: First Response of New Partner of Jelinčič's Monica). Now that they are divorcing, the facts about their (or his) assets can be heard as follows: in the media he claims that Monika came to him without property and that he did not invest in a house in the Slovenian capital or on the Coast.To discuss in public the property of spouses Jelincic came when Monika bought the land in 2011, just off the express road between Koper and Izola. Her assets and net income did not match, leaving her under the tax administration's hood. The paper reported that Monika admitted at the time that her husband had donated € 667,000 and that he had made money by selling antiques and a numismatic collection (he told a media story earlier that was not true - that he had lent him money Styrian celebrator Damjan Murko). Nevertheless, today the financial administration has levied her a quarter of a million euros in tax, which she complained about and was successful in the end.
